name: RenovateMe
description: Renovate your libs on your selected Azure Repo
author: Jean-Yves COUET

inputs.name: renovateOptionsVersion
inputs.label: Renovate version to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default we are using latest, but you can specify the exact version ('10.3.0' minimum for Azure DevOps support)

inputs.name: renovateOptionsArgs
inputs.label: Additional args
inputs.helpMarkDown: example: `--ignore-unstable=false`, to see all args look at the [doc](https://renovateapp.com/docs/configuration-reference/configuration-options)
